lender.name: Tim Peters
lender.loan_because: I believe it is important to give back.
lender.occupational_info:
Within the internet and technology ecosystems I specifically assist clients with help finding the following best in breed businesses/products & services: Call centers (inbound and outbound), live chat and email providers, fulfillment companies, web developers, SEO consultants, payment processing and shopping cart providers, order management software, CRM software, marketing companies.
You can follow me on Twitter at www.twitter.com/timothypeters

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: It's the golden rule of life to treat others as you'd like to be treated. This program supports local entrepreneurs and economies, but it also highlights cooperation and trust in a very personal and compelling way.
lender.occupational_info: Taking care of sick people in a clinic.

lender.name: Natascha
lender.loan_because: It is empowering to the entrepreneur, strengthens their sense of self-sufficiency, and will go a lot further than a handout.
lender.occupational_info: I teach German to adults and I am also working as a herbalist, nutritionist and homeopath, helping people to achieve health naturally.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: God has blessed me with so much. When I was 12, my parents were missionaries in Guatemala and I saw first hand how people suffer when their basic needs are not met. The gift of opportunity is all many people ever need to see them through.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse, a wife, a mother of three, and the step-mother of three more. It's all work.

lender.name: Yuri
lender.loan_because: I believe in this...We'll be able to find the hero inside us by reaching out to others, and in turn find that we are the ones being helped.

lender.name: Casey
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed so that I can bless others

lender.name: AJ Green
lender.loan_because: I wrote a paper on the Grameen Bank as part of being an economics major in Denver, Co. I found this site and thought it would be something neat to do as part of my paper.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I feel that I am very lucky for what I have been given in my life, and would like to extend that privilege to other people
lender.occupational_info: I work for an Engineering firm in dallas, where I am responsable for the testing of industrial automation systems installed in factorys.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: Were not here for a long time, just a good one. So make it count!
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Firefighter/EMT and own my own DJ business.

lender.name: Rita
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use some help to improve their situation!

lender.name: Stefanie
lender.loan_because: microfinance is the way to help the developing world pull itself up from poverty. No paternalism, no dependency-creating aid. Microfinance merely channels funds from those who wish to help to those who know how to help themselves and need a loan to get there. Kiva is brilliant for allowing you and me to donate our small savings directly and transparently to people on the other side of the world.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: my economic stimulus payment arrived.

lender.name: tikvadavaraninc
lender.occupational_info:
Tikva Davaran Car Parts Mercedes-Benz E-Class Comfort
In back, the seat has a high cushion so even taller folks have ample under-thigh support. Though the rear backrest looks flat, it's comfortable, while nearly 36 inches of rear legroom prove enough for a pair of 6-foot staffers riding front and rear.
Tikva Davaran Audi TT Coupe 3.2 Quattro Design/Fit and Finish
There's no criticism inside, where the highest-quality materials come together with peerless fit and finish. The woven headliner is nicer than most cars' upholstery. Our test car's red and black leather brings a nice touch of color to an otherwise typically austere German cabin.
Cars Blog Tikva Davaran : Test Drive: 2009 Acura RL Performance
The RL's handling is adequate and is significantly boosted by the Super Handling All-Wheel Drive (SH-AWD) system that transfers power from front to rear and side to side. The result is that even a Sunday-only driver can corner like a Touring Car champ. In hard cornering, the car feels big, although the steering is quick enough to feel sporty and the newly revised suspension is a better compromise between comfortable and sporty. Acura uses low-rolling-resistance tires, presumably to boost fuel economy, but the lack of grip takes away any teeth the all-wheel-drive system potentially adds. Braking also suffers â€” a stop from 60 mph takes up 131 feet of asphalt. By comparison, the less expensive Hyundai Genesis does it in 117 feet. Unlike the Acura TL, the RL feels as if it needs the SH-AWD just to keep its handling within acceptable limits; again, tires could be the culprit here.

lender.name: Bernd
lender.loan_because: It feels good to help :)

lender.name: Joel
lender.loan_because: I would like the world to be a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work for the not for profit organisation MS Australia. This organisation has the goal of assisting people with the disease Multiple Sclerosis. This is done by providing care to people while also undergoing research which will hopefully lead to a cure. My role is to find ways in which the internet can be used to educate people and engage them in supporting MS Australia.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: What a wonderful idea this is, would love to have follow ups on those I have loaned to in the past.

lender.name: Johan

lender.name: Bettina
lender.loan_because: Happiness grows by sharing it.

lender.loan_because: I believe we all want to be self-sufficient,
lender.occupational_info: I take care of other peoples dogs while they are away for an hour, a day or a week. In American, may people treat their pets as part of their family.

lender.name: Rosemary
lender.occupational_info: I learn about peace and development, I teach others, and I share what I learn as widely as I can.

lender.name: Aleks
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship has a huge impact in its community & doesn't degrade people.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial journalist and report on businesses in Europe.

lender.name: Ken
lender.loan_because: I have a friend who teaches in Ghana and would like to help the people there.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I am extremely fortunate just to have been born when and where I was and to parents who were both able to attend college.
lender.occupational_info: I work to protect the forests and natural habitats of my country.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: I am new to this wonderful world and want to do something to help make it better.
lender.occupational_info: I mostly just lay around and smile and laugh right now, but am learning to sit up and hope to eat solid food before too long.

lender.name: Kana
lender.loan_because: I am only a miniscule snowflake but I can grow with others

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I know what it's like to struggle and know that with just a little bit of help I could really do something!

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I believe in the principle of teaching a man to fish, instead of giving him a fish. If someone is willing to work and support their family, I believe they should have every opportunity possible...this benefits not only their family, but the entire economy.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office where I review and file legal documents with various government offices as well as making sure that they are correct, so that our company can buy and sell properties.

lender.name: Serge / Matias
lender.loan_because: Caring people who believe you need to help those who need help, but in a responsible manner, whereby profit teaches and most importantly allows for Pride and confidence to grow in people who seeks the most for themselves and others around them. The fulfillment of self which is accomplished is by distance a fulfillment of all those around one self (ripple effect)

lender.name: Kandace
lender.loan_because: The Womyn's Centre loans because we love supporting our international sisters!
lender.occupational_info: The Womyn's Centre at Carleton University is a student-run organization that promotes equality and supports women. We are very excited to have the opportunity to provide capacity for women entrepreneurs internationally!

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because: Empowering people to help raise themselves out of poverty via small business loans is a powerful gift that makes me feel like I'm making a difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I educate clinicians and insurance professionals on brain injury and work with survivors and families by providing resources and rehabilitation options through Centre for Neuro Skills.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: "It is in giving that we receive." St. Francis
lender.occupational_info: I'm a choral conductor finishing my Doctor of Musical Arts degree at the University of Southern California. I'm also the Assistant Conductor of the Gay Men's Chorus of Los Angeles.

lender.name: Geraldine
lender.loan_because: I love people
lender.occupational_info: Education and Information

lender.name: Chris Robinson
lender.loan_because: I like to pay it forward.

lender.name: Greg and Karla
lender.loan_because: I know that small business is the backbone of the Global Economy.. So that.. and want to cut someone a break.
lender.occupational_info: I am an accountant.. what can I say?! Love those numbers..

lender.name: Annie
lender.loan_because: people need loans

lender.name: Jeremy
lender.loan_because: I want to help businesses and families around the world in need of some extra funds.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Affiliate Manager for the online marketing firm, CPALead. I handle all of our new and existing Publisher accounts. These Publishers are people who run the companies advertising tools to generate revenue.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: I believe that those who are able to do so have a duty to help people who are in need. This is one way that I can fulfill that duty. I also believe that micro-loans that help people to become financially independent are much more valuable than "handouts." It's the whole "teach a man to fish" thing.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: Auf Schulden reitet das Genie zum Erfolg! Eugen Schmalenbach

lender.name: Maeve
lender.loan_because: I know that my own success in life is almost entirely due to the comfortable surroundings I was born in to. I want to see a world where we each have the same opportunities, no matter what our gender, religion, economic status or country of birth.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a university in the UK, assisting with research on how ecosystem services (the benefits that we derive from nature) can be more sustainably harnessed to improve the lives of the poorest people in the world

lender.name: Candace
lender.loan_because:
I have the opportunity to support hard working individuals who are simply trying to feed and support a roof over their heads for themselves and their families. Security is important, and often all that is needed is a small amount of assistance to change the lives of those with the initiative and the fortitude to pave their own way in this world.
Everyone should have an equal opportunity to better their lives.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others reach their goals.

lender.loan_because: Jesus has blessed me. I want to be a blessing to others through the blessings I have received.

lender.loan_because: Because my brother in law and sister in law gave us a gift certificate to donate as a loan to Kiva
lender.occupational_info: Store owners and business owners of services need to advertise their products, goods and services. I create their advertisement for the Newspaper, magazine or other graphic media.

lender.occupational_info: I enjoy acting/working in theatre, television, & film. I also have a separate entrepreneurial venture in the telecommunications industry.

lender.occupational_info: I am a general manager for an online software company. We are focused on streamlining processes for insurance companies using the latest technology and business practices.

lender.name: tricia
lender.loan_because: I belive that Micro Financing is a wonderful way to offer opportunity to people to help themslves out of poverty, with that comes a wonderfully positive ripple effect to others in the communy as well as to their families. We together can raise the spirit & release the hardship of our neighbours, if we support Micro Financing.
lender.occupational_info: My husband & I have a web site that we have set up in the hope of offering food education & freedom from poverty for many. we are currently working on 3 projects 1 in South Africa, 1 in Zambia & 1 in Fiji. We love what we are able to achive & belive that each person has a divine need to be generous of mind, spirit & to give back to those in need.

lender.name: Helena
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping people who want to improve their circumstances. I think that lending and repaying small loans is an excellent way to bridge cultures.
lender.occupational_info: I work on a study regarding psychology and cancer. I explain our research study to people and ask them to participate. I collect and analyze their responses and report to our funding agency. I am a graduate student studying criminology, law, and society.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I was first bitten by the entrepreneurial bug as a teenager in high school and always knew that I'd have my own business. As a parent, I appreciate the flexibility and freedom I have to work around the needs of my family and want to empower other women--especially those with fewer economic opportunities than I have had--to do the same.
lender.occupational_info: I create heirloom quality pearl jewelry for girls of all ages and the people who love them, from keepsake baby bracelets for a long-awaited baby girl, to pearl chokers for the bride, and every milestone in between. Every strand of pearls I knot becomes an expression of faith, hope, and love for me.

lender.name: Imke
lender.loan_because: It is tremendously joyful to re- and respend the same money - baskets... on others!
lender.occupational_info: I help people in businesses to work together in the best efficient and effective way

lender.name: Minigadgets.nl

lender.occupational_info: We are an online retailstore located in the Netherlands. We sell gadgets and accessoires for mobile phones, mp3 players, laptops and gameconsoles in the Netherlands and Belgium.

lender.name: Miguel
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves an opportunity to make the most of their life. What seems like so little to me can mean so much to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: someone ready to help

lender.name: Arvid
lender.loan_because: I'd rather want my money to help others than the international banking system. And I think it's a great way of helping others help themselves!

lender.occupational_info: I can only hope that when a donation is made it is to someone who deserves it and uses it wisley.

lender.name: Bonita
lender.loan_because: I want to help others. I do not have much but I want to share what little I have with people who appreciate it. To see what a small amount of money can do for people from another country is wonderful and I am glad that I can be a part of that.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently unemployed. Looking for a new job.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: it's worthwhile.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a seniors' retirement centre, distributing medications, doing physical assessments, doing wound care, and working with various other healthcare professionals.

lender.name: Elise
lender.loan_because: It is the most effective and efficient way for me to help those in need.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: Everyone can use a helping hand, and offering that had when I can makes the world just that little bit better.

lender.name: Dusty
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a way to empower individuals, improve the local economy, and bring us closer together in the world community.

lender.name: Luke
lender.loan_because: It has meant a lot to me that other people have helped me when I needed it in the past. It saddens me that so many people in our world are living in poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I connect manufacturing companies that build equipment with suppliers that make engineered metal components for their equipment.

lender.name: susi
lender.loan_because: i believe in this organisation, micro-loans, the good site in every human being!! if we all together do something, it will work out fine and this world will be a better place for ALL of us!! :o))

lender.name: Alina
lender.loan_because: I want to help others who are not as well off as I am. I am lucky to have what I do and I want others to be happy also. =)
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at the University of Florida and will be teaching high school students.

lender.name: Diane
lender.loan_because: It seems to be a small way in which I can help those less fortunate than myself, without any religious leanings. I also am happy to indulge my philanthropic tendencies without breaking my bank account.
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of paperwork for a Financial Advisor - forms, mailings and answering phones. Customer service is a big part of what I do. I also keep him on-schedule for meetings and appointments.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: it is important to give back and I don't just mean to your local community but to the world. It is time to change the world's opinion of the USA and eradicate the ethnocentrism that exists today. I am actively involved with my companies philanthropic giving in the U.S. and Kiva is a great avenue to help people on a global level.
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner at a small government consulting firm in the DC area. We primarily assist with help projects to be delivered on time and within budget.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's a blessing to be able to share.
lender.occupational_info: I have written several plays about the women in Early America which I perform for historical sites, schools and other educational programs. I'm a spinner, weaver and seamstress. I make historically accurate clothing for my own use as well as museums, historical re-enactors and theatrical productions. I'm also a Minister in The Church of The Flying Spaghetti Monster and Coven leader of the Skywatchers Circle.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the opportunity for a life free from poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I provide educational opportunities for college students outside of the classroom.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people hope and the chance to succeed in their dreams of having better lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a nanny, caring for children whose parents are not at home during the day.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I feel that I have been blessed and want to give others the opportunity to feel God's blessings by making positive changes in their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a lab that researches the human genome and other organisms genomes, with the eventual goal of improving human health through a better understanding of our DNA.

lender.name: Rose
lender.loan_because: To give back and make the world a better place. To encourage people to go into business and better themselves.

lender.loan_because: I have no excuses not to
